content: this adorable summer vacay sunglass pouch is super quick and easy to work up and is great for using up stashed yarn this pattern is one of the 2024 afternoon delight summer cal patterns **materials** * approximately 65 yds of category 4 medium weight yarn i used knit picks dishie yarn in the conch colorway * size i 5 5mm furls cancer streamline zodiac crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
